lines.text: Hello, Frank? This is Greg Leyden. How would you like to go out for dinner tonight? No, tonight! Yeah! No, no, no, no. This time, we'll pick *you* up.

The Leyden Family continued to receive more threats and obscene phone calls. They were denied their old jobs, and nobody else would hire them. Eventually, their benefits and savings exhausted, the Leydens were forced to move to another state, change their name and try a new beginning.
